website_summaries.verdict: A brand co-owned by Maria Sharapova, this oil spray leaves skin with a healthy sheen.
pros: Makes skin shiny without a greasy feel
Meadowfoam seed oil locks in moisture, so is especially good for dry skin
cons: Some irritation reported from users with sensitive skin

customer_reviews.title: Leaks everywhere
customer_reviews.text: Overall this product is fine. It does as advertised and protects from sunburn. I probably lost over half of the product to it leaking all over. It sits upright and still oozes all over the place. Poorly packaged for such expensive sunscreen. Example photo.. I had it in the cup holder of my car and instead of using the pump on the packaging I can just dip my finger in my cup holder and apply the product. Special.
customer_reviews.author: Blake Bekken

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: So, until today I have been using this oil as a regular moisturizer because I wanted an oil with spf that didn't have too many toxic chemicals to use as a moisturizer. Today was the 1st time that I got to use it in the actual sun and this is what happened. Smh. I am so burnt and I even reapplied TWICE at the beach 😣 I'm so disappointed that this didn't work the way I thought it would. I was so happy to try it in the sun too. If you want to use it for a regular moisturizer, I guess it isn't bad, but if you want this for the beach and everything- try at your own risk.
customer_reviews.author: maya

customer_reviews.title: Must Try This!
customer_reviews.text: I don't understand it but this oil is NOT oily. It really works and leaves your skin feeling very soft, I little goes a long way and it's worth every penny. I wish the manufacturer would consider Redesigning the dispenser. I think the pump might be more comfortable using if the bottle wasn't completely straight and smooth. your hands are slippery while applying and it is a little difficult to pump the bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Alan Sheinberg

customer_reviews.title: Love Supergoop, but unimpressed
customer_reviews.text: I used the Supergoop City SPF Serum for my face for a long time, and didn't have any issues with breakouts on my skin. Due to the price of that, I was hoping that this more affordable oil would do okay on my sensitive skin. Unfortunately, this also makes me break out not only on my face, but my arms and chest too. I'd pass on this if you're prone to breakouts or have sensitive skin. Also, I apparently didn't read the details well enough before purchasing because this is the tiniest bottle ever and in my opinion, not worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Baum

customer_reviews.title: Luxurious feel and very good protection.
customer_reviews.text: This sunscreen is amazing for dry southern calif weather. I haven’t used In humid weather but it is not greasy. It just leaves a really nice soft sheen on skin. I’m always looking for something that feels moisturizing and good spf protection. This is it. Only drawback is that pump doesn’t spray a lot of product so when doing legs, it’s a long process of spray-rub-repeat. Would love improvement of spray— this is a push down pump like hairspray but with something slippery, I’d prefer a grab handle squeeze (like a version of windex bottle).
customer_reviews.author: Sheila K.

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight, long lasting, no sunburn!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second purchase of Supergoop sunscreen oil. Hate the pump bottle but I love the product. Just unscrew the lid and pour a bit in your palm. Lasts forever. I've never been sunburned when using this product and my keratosis pilaris is much improved when using this all summer. Very light weight, does not transfer to clothing.
customer_reviews.author: Joan Marie

customer_reviews.title: Finally found perfect sunscreen for face
customer_reviews.text: I have very dry, fair skin and have been looking for a sunscreen that doesn't break me out, run into my eyes, and doesn't feel just GROSS on my face. I believe this is the winner. The oil absorbs wonderfully and leaves my skin feeling soft and not greasy. No transfer into my hair and no running into my eyes since it does fully absorb. It doesn't itch or feel sticky or gritty at ALL. I'll definitely update if it breaks my skin out after a week or so of wear, but so far- this stuff is golden.
customer_reviews.author: MBG

customer_reviews.title: BEWARE! ALCOHOL main ingredient!!
customer_reviews.text: ALCOHOL! Listed at the top of inactive ingredients. I used this for a while and loved the consistency and way it made my skin look. Then I took a closer look at the ingredient list. I don’t understand why they are chosing to use alcohol in this product. They claim it helps reduce the signs of aging from the sun but having ALCOHOL as a main ingredient will certainly cause more damage than this product claims to prevent. Please super goop- REMOVE alcohol from the ingredients. This could be a great product but only if you remove the alcohol.
customer_reviews.author: QT 3.14

customer_reviews.title: Great protection and looks great
customer_reviews.text: I’m practically transparent as a natural redhead with very pale skin tone. I’m religious about sun protection, but I’m always on the hunt for easy, effective products- especially for my face. I spray this into my hand twice, and dab all over my face after I apply moisturizer. After giving it a few minutes to set, I finish my makeup. Zero flashback, and no oily face. My skin is pretty sensitive, and I have an oily t-zone but I haven’t had an issue with either using this product. I’m using a different brand spf setting spray about once an hour when I’m exposed, but this absolutely works. Very easy, effective, and makeup looks great applied over it.
customer_reviews.author: Faith M. Dean

customer_reviews.title: Great for sensitive skin!
customer_reviews.text: I have a pretty hard time finding sunscreens that work for my sensitive skin. Usually sunscreens end up causing me breakouts or irritation. I am having the opposite experience with Supergoop! It's a very light oil that makes my skin soft. It's a true oil, so I wait a few minutes before applying make up over the top of it. The protection is excellent (no burns yet), and the dispenser is small but mighty. This came highly recommended from a friend and I love it. It's gentle on my skin, has a pleasant light citrus smell, and most of all protects my face. I will absolutely buy more.
customer_reviews.author: A. Meyer

customer_reviews.title: Finally a sunscreen that my husband will wear!
customer_reviews.text: I love sunscreens but hate the white residue that it leaves on my skin. I recently got my husband into skincare and he prefers oils to lotions. When I found that this oil has SPF I knew I had a winner. The oil comes out of a spray, with maybe 1 inch in diameter mist. The oil is lighter than I expected and takes about 2 pumps to really cover the face. He takes the small size with him everywhere. Super easy to travel with. I also steal to use on the back of my hands (who wants their hands to age while driving!!).
customer_reviews.author: Timothy S. Pile

customer_reviews.title: Chemical based
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a change from drying zinc based sunblock I always use. I put my blinders on and ordered this just to try something new. It does blend nicely into the skin, not oily, smells mild and does give a nice glow. But I decided to actually look at the ingredients today and it’s obviously all chemical based sun protection which mimic estrogen in our bodies and it’s problematic for overall health. I don’t find that it works very well either. I didn’t burn but still got very tan using this. I’m used to products that prevent all damage including that coveted brown skin.
customer_reviews.author: emily h

customer_reviews.title: There are better options for less
customer_reviews.text: The sunscreen was fine, it goes on easily, wears like any other oil you use (not like a traditional sunscreen) and you only need a small amount for decent coverage. I found it wore off quickly however and I needed to reapply often for it to continue to protect my skin. Glad I tried it, but I won't be buying it again as there are better options for less. My current favorite is Hawaiian Tropic Island Sport Lotion Sunscreen - SPF 50, which goes on like a lotion, dries quickly, isn't sticky, and protects my skin all day without reapplying (assuming i'm not swimming or sweating excessively)).
customer_reviews.author: Arie

customer_reviews.title: What went wrong?
customer_reviews.text: I've been using and loving Super Goop for about 4 years, but I don't know if they changed the recipe or if I have just developed an intolerance to it, but it's been HORRIBLE! It burns the eyes - it never did that before! And made my skin breakout in a horrible, itchy, scaly rash. I used it several times this summer, thinking that it couldn't be Super Goop that it making me react this way, but I finally had to face it. I threw it in the trash and am now looking for a new go-to sunscreen.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah W

customer_reviews.title: No Actual Sun Protection
customer_reviews.text: This product seems like a great solution to having to put on thick SPF 50 white glue. However I’ve used it multiple times and each scenario end up completely burned after just 30 minutes in the sun. I highly discourage people from using it if they actually want sun protection
customer_reviews.author: M. Inga

customer_reviews.title: Perfect beach must have!
customer_reviews.text: We live on the beach in FL and I was so over the white residue, hard to rub in and difficult to fully cover lotion sunscreens. This product was so wonderful, so beautiful, so refreshing and I didn’t get any burns while wearing it! Unfortunately my husband ran it over after approximately 3 uses by accident and then, after realizing how expensive it was, forbid me from repurchasing. But in my opinion, it’s well worth the price point and10/10 would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Cameron

customer_reviews.title: Quite the effective sunscreen!
customer_reviews.text: At first I was skeptical to use this sunscreen because I felt it was going to be ineffective since it seemed like it was just a light oil. Then, I was nervous that it would cause me to break out because it was an oil. But I’m happy to report that it is a very effective sunscreen and I have had zero irritation or breakouts from using it everyday. Worth the money and a little goes a long way. Oh, and one other unexpected benefit is that it is pretty hydrating (not moisturizing), which is what every skin type needs.
customer_reviews.author: Joyann Farnam

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: I never thought about using sunscreen for my scalp. Since my hair is thinning I worried more about it. My dermatologist had recommended to make sure to use sunscreen for my scalp. I do have sensitive skin and I think this product works really well. It's interesting to find that your scalp does get really hot without this on. I don't find it's that greasy and I tend to just shampoo it out later.
customer_reviews.author: S.M.T.

customer_reviews.title: Buy this!
customer_reviews.text: This is wonderful! I live in Texas where the sun is shining year around, protection is a must. This is so light, non greasy and has a mild pleasant smell that doesn’t linger. I will always use this product! Great on all my tattoos and brings out all the bright color.
customer_reviews.author: Roxanne Rushing

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoy this product. I have extremely fair and sensitive skin that breaks out easily with sunscreen. This product leaves my skin soft and protected without clogging pores. Skin cancer runs in my family, so I use this daily throughout the summer with no issues. I have tried every sunscreen for sensitive skin that I could find and this has been the only one to works for me.
customer_reviews.author: lytle42812

customer_reviews.title: Burns my eyes!
customer_reviews.text: I’m a group fitness instructor. Thanks to this product I now know that sweat gets in my eyes. It stings and causes my eyes to get red! That’s why I will at least avoid applying it to my forehead. Other smaller issues: it gives that “shiny” look especially as the day wears on, and finally they don’t tell you how much to apply. How many pumps will give the spf 50 protection?
customer_reviews.author: Mary dreaming

customer_reviews.title: Great sun protection and skin moisturizer!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! I’ve used serval SuperGoop products for body sun protection. This one is my favorite because it moisturizes my skin while protecting it. I have not gotten sun burned while playing tennis outside for 3 hours. I did reapply which was very easy since it is a spray.
customer_reviews.author: linda

customer_reviews.title: In LOVE!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this year to try and I was obsessed. I've missed using oils over the years and once I saw this I was very hopeful. It keep me protected plus gave me a nice glow. I'm olive toned so I dont burn easily but I do have sensitive skin. I thought it was great and will buy again this coming summer. All my girlfriends were stealing it from my beach bag!
customer_reviews.author: kalabdew

customer_reviews.title: Been using over the summer- perfect for parts. Worth the price
customer_reviews.text: Love this product and the smaller size is great for on the go. Whole family uses it. Even though it’s oil, you don’t feel greasy. The scent is light and we all have sensitive skin and never break out. A must have for summer.
customer_reviews.author: Isabels Mom

customer_reviews.title: So good!
customer_reviews.text: Love this stuff! I’m about halfway through the bottle and my skin is noticeably softer. I’ve had no breakouts from this. It’s moisturizing enough for me that I just use this in the morning. It absorbs well enough after a while that I don’t look shiny either, so my surprise. Not overly fragranced either, but still smells nice. I will definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Buy it now!
customer_reviews.text: I’m a huge fan of Supergoop, but wasn’t sure what to expect with this being an oil. It was seriously the best sunscreen I have ever tried! It wasn’t greasy at all, and just left a slight beautiful sheen on my skin. Even my husband liked it, which is shocking because he hates sunscreen (terrible, I know)!
customer_reviews.author: Gabriella Garcia

customer_reviews.title: My Secret Weapon to a Bronzed Tan!
customer_reviews.text: I can't say enough about this SPF 50 Oil! It's FABULOUS! I swear it helps bring out the golden tones to my tan! I don't get the same results with other sunscreens! Plus it's SPF 50 y'all!! 5-0! I use it at the pool and the beach...however, like every other oil, sand does stick to it at the beach! Oh well -- amazing TANS + Protection here we come!!
customer_reviews.author: KFlurry

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: I really like this as an alternative to creams. The spray isn’t strong enough that you can use without significantly rubbing in and you do need to give it a few minutes to soak in after applying but it does a great job of protecting my skin. The scent is light and pleasant. It’s easy to use a lot of though so it can get a bit pricey.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie

customer_reviews.title: Great sunscreen!
customer_reviews.text: Goes on well with no white zinc collection on the skin, which is excellent for the face. Put it on before moisturizing and sometime I just leave off the extra moisturizers as this has a wonderful softening and brightening effect. Love that is has good ingredients, especially Vit E.
customer_reviews.author: Jo

customer_reviews.title: Clear packaging doesn't make sense for chemical sunscreen which will ...
customer_reviews.text: Clear packaging doesn't make sense for chemical sunscreen which will degrade in sunlight. Caused both me and my wife to break out.
customer_reviews.author: Triste

customer_reviews.title: great  but don't get it in your eyes
customer_reviews.text: Love this produce- it's oil but def not oily. I use it on my kids because it's so easy and doesn't leave a white pasty residue. I have squirted it in my eyes on accident and that was very irritating. I am just more careful now and it's fine. Def recommend this product and am excited to try more supergoop products.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for tattoos!
customer_reviews.text: Hi! I saw ads for this product for darker skinned ladies and how it didn't sit on top of the skin being pasty. I thought this would work marvelously to wear over my arm tattoos without making the colors look blah and it looks AMAZING! A++ would recommend for keeping your ink looking gorgeous and protected from the sun.
customer_reviews.author: Kiki Von Pants

customer_reviews.title: Great Product - Not Cost Effective
customer_reviews.text: My girlfriend and I love this product but have to admit that for the $$$ you don't get a lot of product. So of course, the real question is whether it's "worth it". In my opinion, "NO". My girlfriend would probably disagree so there you have it. Ladies, buy with confidence. Guys, go for something less diva and more cost effective per application!!
customer_reviews.author: Troy2 Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Greasy. Doesn’t prevent sunburn.
customer_reviews.text: This sunscreen just didn’t work for me. It’s greasy and I always burn when I wear it. I won’t be buying it again.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: It's not as oily as you may think.
customer_reviews.text: I've seen images on their website that makes this sunscreen look really oily, but it's not. It's a dry oil so once it goes on it just feels like a very light layer of oil. I wore it all summer and did not have any bad reactions, nor did i get a sunburn. I have so many bottles of sunblocks/sunscreens and this is one of my favorites.
customer_reviews.author: MsLeesh

customer_reviews.title: Good oil. Bad packaging.
customer_reviews.text: The sunscreen itself is pretty good. It smells pleasant and dries to a comfortable texture on my skin. The only problem was the bottle. It pumped out these meager little squirts that made it hard to get enough product. The spray stream wasn't direct which meant getting squirted in the face when my shoulder was what I was aiming for. I ended up putting it in another bottle altogether.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Love this stuff
customer_reviews.text: Love this stuff. I only apply this to my bare skin for a day in the sun. I'll also apply to my neck, arms, and hands. Since I've never used with makeup, I'm not sure how to would react, but I would assume not well as it is very oily (obviously). But makes your skin feel very hydrated and fresh. It's also very light and does not smell like sunscreen.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah B

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: First of all Supergoop works as a sunscreen. Some have asked me if it is worth the price. My answer is YES! It helps maintain moisture on my skin. A little goes a long way. It is the best sunscreen I have ever used when it comes to nourishing my skin. I am on the beach a LOT during the summer months.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Totally burned using product
customer_reviews.text: Used this product as directed and got completely burned. Used it swimming for less than the 80 minutes and I am a total lobster. Crap product.
customer_reviews.author: Colleen Mary

customer_reviews.title: Love this brand!
customer_reviews.text: I'll be ordering this again. No sunburn. Love the oil base. It really works!!!
customer_reviews.author: Tra

customer_reviews.title: Makes wearing sunscreen a treat!
customer_reviews.text: I generally hate sunscreens, but am very fair skinned and will burn in about 20min without it. This oil is lightweight with now nasty smell, or extra white pastiness. It gives you a nice glow, and gives good hydration without any breakouts or pore blockage. This product actually makes wearing sunscreen a treat.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work for me
customer_reviews.text: Easy to apply, but made my face break out and was very oily after a few hours. Didn't seem like spf 50, I have fair skin and got a small sunburn while wearing this.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Not good for the beach
customer_reviews.text: Got a gnarly sunburn at the river yesterday despite multiple reapplications--this doesn't last long, not water resistant. I like the texture and moisture but would not recommend for beach/swimming use
customer_reviews.author: johnny5

customer_reviews.title: light scent, luxurious easy spray oil based SPF
customer_reviews.text: I have dry skin and prefer an oil base SPF. This moisturizes and lasts a long time. I work outdoors and enjoy outdoor activities and this holds up to the rigors of both. Love the fresh, light subtle fragrance. It does NOT smell like a typical sunscreen. Pump spray in a cute container. I bought two. 1 for bag, 1 for home.
customer_reviews.author: PSC

customer_reviews.title: Great Sunscreen
customer_reviews.text: I am very pale with red hair and green eyes so I put on strong sunscreen every day. I use this on my face and my tatoo. I sometimes layer other sunscreen over this if I am going to be outside in strong sun but I found this to be effective on it's on when used as directed (reapplication, etc.).
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Favorite sunscreen
customer_reviews.text: By far the best sunscreen for the beach. It’s very light and effective. I burn easy and this worked for a 5 day trip to Jamaica. I use this for my body and their rosemary mist for my face
customer_reviews.author: autumn b.

customer_reviews.title: It’s good not great
customer_reviews.text: The sprayer nozzle is not good. It’s not a uniform spray but kind of spits. I like the oil form though. It’s nice and light. Would like it to last, as far as moisturizing, longer though.
customer_reviews.author: KDM

customer_reviews.title: Greasy
customer_reviews.text: The reviews i read said it absorbed well into the skin and didnt feel oily at all... not true for me. It felt VERY oily. Impossible to put makeup over. I do prefer it to sunscreen but i only use on days i dont wear makeup
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ginger Approved
customer_reviews.text: This is my all time favorite sunscreen. It feels amazing, is lightweight and doesn't make me break out! I am a fair skinned red head and swear by it! It also lasts a deceivingly long time. I tell everyone about it!
customer_reviews.author: eximas_lex

customer_reviews.title: Simply the best for the entire family!!
customer_reviews.text: Supergoop to the rescue!! This is by far the best spf I've ever used and I'll never switch from this. May appear small, but you don't need to apply much to get the coverage necessary.
customer_reviews.author: Anita Snack

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: I cant believe how well this sits under makeup, after letting it sink in of course. I was expecting to hate this on makeup days but was shocked. My makeup looked extra nice with this under! Will repurchase. This is a great option for dryer skin.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Quade

customer_reviews.title: Great product!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this stuff! Trusted the reviews and I'm glad I did. It's an oil, so I was scared to put on my face in fear of breaking out (I'm a freak about that) and nope! No breakouts. In fact, it's oily at first but after you absorb it, it actually hydrates the skin and truly does work all day as a facial sunscreen. You use so little it will last through many uses!
customer_reviews.author: Laura S. Fernandez

customer_reviews.title: Prepare to burn
customer_reviews.text: It doesn’t work. I have fair skin and so does my daughter. She’s never had a sunburn, but with this she just got her first one. I’m burned too. Buyer beware.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good, not great
customer_reviews.text: Love how it's non-greasy and convenient spray application, but it's almost too dry to the point that I have to apply more than I should (for decent & even coverage) for the price. Plus spritzer sucks. Spritzer is better on full size bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: WARNING: This item isn't eligible for return
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to return this item and got this message: This item isn't eligible for return For safety reasons, items containing flammable liquids or gases can’t be returned to Amazon. For more information or help, please contact us. So be really sure you want this before you purchase...
customer_reviews.author: IvynSimon

customer_reviews.title: Anaphylactic to coconut or sunflower,Not a product for you.
customer_reviews.text: Specifically requested information about containing sunflower or coconut oil. Anaphylactic reaction to both ingredients, currently in product. Not found on product ingredient list.
customer_reviews.author: beth

customer_reviews.title: Okay product.
customer_reviews.text: Product smells nice. Seems to protect adequately. Downside is the spray feature. It is very straight and splashed around. With an oil that’s not so great. I found I have to spray onto my palm and then wipe it onto my skin. My hope had been that I could simply spray it directly onto my face.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works well.
customer_reviews.text: I only use this on my face because it’s not the cheapest but it works well. It has a pleasant scent and it doesn’t make me break out. One little bottle lasted me all summer.
customer_reviews.author: Pamcakes

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful glow
customer_reviews.text: Use sparingly to avoid a greasy feeling, but the citrus scent combined with the healthy glow it gives your skin is worth the price! I also love the convenience of how it’s dispensed through the mist pump!
customer_reviews.author: Jackie

customer_reviews.title: Small yet potent!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my car to provide protection for my hands when driving. It’s small and compact enough to stow away. Love that it’s easy to apply.
customer_reviews.author: Farheen

customer_reviews.title: not a fan
customer_reviews.text: I do not like how greasy it is and sadly my face burned and I am very dark skinned and was very surprised. I def. like their lotion better than the oil. Never had an issue with it, will be swapping back to that.
customer_reviews.author: daph

customer_reviews.title: Definitely recommend
customer_reviews.text: So far, loving this sunscreen! Put some on my face but was feeling lazy and didn’t apply to my arms because it was an rainy morning. Sun came out and my arms BURNED but my face was fine. Wasn’t greasy or burning my eyes which I often have a problem with. Probably going to Supergoop products if this continues to work so well.
customer_reviews.author: Leah

customer_reviews.title: but I've learned to wait a few minutes and it's usually fine.
customer_reviews.text: This stuff seems to keep my freckly face from getting more damage. The only issue with it is that your face will be oily for a bit after applying the sunscreen. My glasses are a wreck in the morning after putting it on, but I've learned to wait a few minutes and it's usually fine.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney

customer_reviews.title: I kind of love this stuff!
customer_reviews.text: Squirt a couple pumps in with your moisturizer in your hands. Put on face. That's it! It's super easy, not greasy, and smells great.
customer_reviews.author: SMD

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff..
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for SPF 50 in a oil. To use on my tattoos I don't like lotion it makes tattoo's dull looking. It works really good did not cause no rash It is not oily for an oil , I know that's hard to believe but it's not. So it's definitely a win-win.👍
customer_reviews.author: Mike &  CIN.

customer_reviews.title: I wish I could give this 0 stars. I ...
customer_reviews.text: I wish I could give this 0 stars. I applied this sunscreen continuously when out in the sun one day and got absolutely fried. It did NOT work!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Dont put it near your eyes
customer_reviews.text: This may go without saying but this isn't the best sunscreen if you're going to be sweating. It's awesome because it leaves a nice glow but the sweat getting into my eyes was seriously burning.
customer_reviews.author: Margie T

customer_reviews.title: Never burnt!
customer_reviews.text: A little oily but absorbs well, keeps my skin hydrated in dry weather and I've never burnt once, even if I sweat a little. Not ideal for layering on powder foundation, but holds other makeup well after it's absorbed.
customer_reviews.author: Tlee

customer_reviews.title: Great sunscreen
customer_reviews.text: Stay safe from the sun while glowing like a goddess. Can be a bit mess with with the spray bottle so I carefully dump into hands and apply with fingers.
customer_reviews.author: Anna Garner

customer_reviews.title: Kind of greasy
customer_reviews.text: I’m usually a fan of facial oils, but this one was just meh. The sunscreen did its job, but my face felt greasy after about 30 minutes
customer_reviews.author: Kristen

customer_reviews.title: Yummy, effective, gentle
customer_reviews.text: This is such a good product. Smells good. It works. I can use it on my son w eczema.
customer_reviews.author: Marielle hadid

customer_reviews.title: This is a great sunscreen. It's moisturizing and easy to apply
customer_reviews.text: This is a great sunscreen. It's moisturizing and easy to apply. I was a little skeptical about using oil as sunscreen, but I haven't gotten burned yet while I've used it.
customer_reviews.author: Julie C. Rogers

customer_reviews.title: Everyday use is a must
customer_reviews.text: Love this for everyday wear. Very light feeling and moisturizes my skin while wearing it too. No sunburn here! Will purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: NParm

customer_reviews.title: Not waterproof
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this product because we have too many sunscreens that are super thick and hard to rub in. This one goes on easily. It rubs off easily as well. I wrongfully assumed this would be waterproof and scorched myself. I have yet to try it on a no water day. I love the way it feels but not that it didn’t protect my skin.
customer_reviews.author: Laurel Perry

customer_reviews.title: Greasy
customer_reviews.text: Advertised as not greasy but is SO greasy! Would have returned but missed window Had to buy something else to replace this greasy product
customer_reviews.author: Patricia J.

customer_reviews.title: Pretty interesting
customer_reviews.text: I was so intrigued to try this as it sounded so good. It really doesn't leave you feeling greasy, and sinks right in. My skin is more glowy than after using regular sunscreen, and I don't have to worry about getting white marks on my clothes when applying! The smell takes a little getting used to - I'm not a fan - but it dissipates pretty quickly. So far, no sunburn!
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: I really like that it’s light and it does have a heavy build up can go under makeup as well Nice fragrance
customer_reviews.author: jazzy

customer_reviews.title: Always use sunscreen!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for something I can wear under makeup and wasn’t super greasy feeling and this works!
customer_reviews.author: Minx

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This was my first time using this brand and im hooked. though its an oil it doesn't clog my pores and gives me great protection.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Review of Supergoop! Sun-Defying Sunscreen Oil with Meadowfoam SPF 50
customer_reviews.text: I am happy I bought the travel size. It is not moisturizing at all, I couldn't finish it. Skip this one!!!
customer_reviews.author: Michele

customer_reviews.title: Like it.
customer_reviews.text: I always apply almond oil with my morning moisturizer. I’ve swapped it out for this one. It’s very moisturizing. I like it.
customer_reviews.author: Samir & Lopa Kapur

customer_reviews.title: really like this oil!
customer_reviews.text: What a unique product. It blends in well and smells great. Haven't gotten burned!
customer_reviews.author: amm10122

customer_reviews.title: Nice application, but it burns my eyes
customer_reviews.text: This goes on well, and soaks into the skin but if you sweat at all or rub your eyes it burns pretty badly. I had to stop using it.
customer_reviews.author: Goldchings

customer_reviews.title: Sunscreen fail: clothes stained, skin burned.
customer_reviews.text: I'm flummoxed by all of the positive reviews for this sunscreen. I applied a liberal amount of this, reapplied after a few hours, and still burned like a lobster after a few hours in the sun. Granted, I do have very fair skin, but I'm a sunscreen devotee and I've never had a sunscreen be so inaffetive. Plus, it will stain any part of your clothing that it gets in contact with.
customer_reviews.author: gardeniabean

customer_reviews.title: Great effect, not easy to apply
customer_reviews.text: I think Good for your skin. However i Find iT hard to apply on your face. IT is a pump effect, first on your hand and then you have to put the thin oil on your face. Most of the oil is and stays on your hand. And iT is a small bottle....
customer_reviews.author: Borg

customer_reviews.title: Great product, no sunscreen smell.
customer_reviews.text: This works as a sunscreen but feels and smells like a beautiful moisturizer.
customer_reviews.author: Aewhitavb

customer_reviews.title: Just ok
customer_reviews.text: Very oily. Not fond of the scent. I may try a different product from this Brand.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great SPF for under makeup.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely loved this SPF/ oil sheen. It left my skin dewy and softer throughout the use.
customer_reviews.author: Jose I Sorto Jr

customer_reviews.title: Must have for sensitive skin!
customer_reviews.text: Best sunscreen for sensitive skin! Absorbs quickly, no heavy scent, reapply easily even on wet skin!
customer_reviews.author: VTgirl

customer_reviews.title: Silky soft skin
customer_reviews.text: New favorite sunscreen! Works great for protection and leaves skin silky soft!
customer_reviews.author: Dachefwife

customer_reviews.title: Nope!
customer_reviews.text: So oily/greasy! I was hoping it wasn’t since many reviewers said it didn’t leave them oily. And I have dry skin too. Very disappointed. And now I have this huge bottle and I can’t send it back.
customer_reviews.author: jessica jones

customer_reviews.title: moisture oil but not greasy
customer_reviews.text: doesn't have that spf stink, light weight oil that soaks in so its no greasy. Most spf has alcohol that dries out my skin this is pleasant scent and moisturizing. bit pricey but totally worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: yinfin

customer_reviews.title: I love this stuff
customer_reviews.text: I love not having to rub lotion in, I love that it makes my skin look seksi, I love that I don't burn.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Who knew SPF could be so great?!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is awesome. I have dry skin and it is perfect for me. Smells great too.
customer_reviews.author: CBPB

customer_reviews.title: Did not work, now sun burned
customer_reviews.text: This did not work for me. I’ve tried using it a few times. Have been burnt every time. Not good for fair skinned people. I am now buying other lotions to fix my sunburn.
customer_reviews.author: Sara Tanger

customer_reviews.title: LOVE!!!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is great. I do feel like you need to reapply more frequently than a cream, but it goes on much more quickly and smoothly. It feels great on the skin and smells great. Very easy to apply. Probably my favorite sunscreen ever. Love, love, love!
customer_reviews.author: ADS

customer_reviews.title: Smells fabulous, feels and looks great!
customer_reviews.text: Oh my God I can’t tell you how much I love the stuff. It smells absolutely amazing, it is not greasy, it’s feels great on your skin. Every time I use it, my husband asked me what I’m wearing, LOL.
customer_reviews.author: Kirsten C Vick

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight, no sunburns!
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight and prevented me from burning during a 4-day Las Vegas trip! I reapplied every hour (while at the pool) and had moisturizing coverage for several hours.
customer_reviews.author: Sterling M.

customer_reviews.title: Give this brand some love
customer_reviews.text: Love it only problem if you have oily skin it doesnt seem to work very good for it.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Kids love
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my kids who have sensitive skin and they well with it. Lasts re size longer than you would think.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

product_meta.title: Supergoop! Sun-Defying Sunscreen Oil SPF 50, 5 fl oz - Hydrating Vitamin E Body Oil & Broad Spectrum Sunscreen Protection - Nourishing Body Oil with Marigold, Meadowfoam & Grape Seed Extracts
product_meta.description: Size:5 Fl OzThis lightweight, non-greasy formula provides superior antioxidant protection, diminishes signs of UV damage, and enhances skin hydration while providing broad spectrum SPF 50 protection.
feature_bullets: Good To Glow; This ultra-hydrating SPF 50 sunscreen body oil leaves skin glowing & protected, without feeling greasy; Give your skin a brilliant glow, & diminish signs of UV damage, all in one; Water-resistant for 80 minutes

Feel-good Formula; Our lightweight & hydrating body & facial oil absorbs easily & provides superior sun protection; Spray & lather over your body each morning to boost your skin’s natural glow; Use as a post-shower oil for ultra-moisturizing results

Super-powered SPF; Our sunscreen oil contains antioxidant-rich ingredients like marigold, meadowfoam, & grape seed extracts to nourish & protect skin while giving it a healthy glow; A great Vitamin E oil for face, body or any area exposed to the sun

Your New Healthy Habit; 90% of the signs of aging come from the sun; With Supergoop! it’s easy to make SPF part of your daily ritual; We believe your skin should feel light, soft, & beautiful when wearing sunscreen

Experts In SPF; At Supergoop! we reimagined what SPF could be, & we continue to create the best protection out there; Our clean, effective formulas feel so good you’ll actually want to wear them Every Single Day
